pages.text: The Rain Collector is part of the Rain Collector multiblock structure.$(br)Connect this block to a $(l:rain_collector_controller)Rain Collector Controller$(/l) using the GUI or a $(l:pipe_wrench)Pipe Wrench$(/l).$(br)When connected to a Controller, you can access its fluid tank and inventory.$(br)The block is fully automatable.$(br)A comparator can be used to read the water level of the tank.
As the Rain Collector contains a Tile Entity, it is not recommended to use it for decoration purposes.
